title: Onnume Aagala Lyrics English Meaning

Onnume Aagala Song Lyrics English Meaning

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
en kannu kalangala
en nenju valikkala
kaadhal kavundhuthaan
ponathaala

sirikka marukkala
sarakka adikkala
kadhali navundhuthaan
ponathaale.

andha kaala kaadhal
pol ippa illaiye
indha kaala kadhal thaan
romba maaripoche
ellaam maari ponadhe

naan, dhaadi valakkala
yen,  nodinju pogala
naan, sogam aagala

onnume onnume ulla aagala
onnume onnume ulla aagala

suthama suththithaan
yedhum maarala
single ah irukalaam
thappe illa

onnume onnume

en kannu kalangala
en nenju valikkala
kaadhal kavundhuthaan
ponathaala

Feb-u maasathula
mabbaa thiriyum nilai
enaku nalla velai varavillai

enai kelvi kaetkave
evanum illaiye

indha kadhal geethal ellaam
romba maari poche
nallaa maari ponadhe

yen phone adikkala
call panna thonala
naan tiredeh aagala

onnume onnume ulla aagala
onnume onnume ulla aagala

kadhalum ponathaal
nondhu pogala.
suthama suththithaan
yaedhum maarala.
single ah irukalaam
thappe illa

enna aanaalum
avalin andha saththam
mattum podhume

ennai thaedi aval
varum nerame
kan munne minnalgal
thaakkume

avalodu andha sila
naatkalai ninaikkaamal
vazha vazhiyillaiye

edharkkaaga indha idaiveli
idhu endrum thevaiyillaye

tha..kannu kalangudhu
ena nenju valikkudhu
kaadhal kavundhuthaan
ponathaale

idhayam vedikkudhe
sarakku alaikkuthe
kadhali navvundhuthaan
ponathaala

nadakka mudiyala
thoonga mudiyala
avan illaamathaan
naanum illa

onnum aagalanu
nadikka theriyala
vetti sceneu
velaikkaagala

aagala onnum aagala
kaalam maari pogum
kadhal maari pogumaa
aagala onnum aagala
kaalam maari pogum
kadhal maari pogaathe(2)

onnume onnume ulla aagala

English Meaning
I tried my best :)
I didn’t cry
My chest didn’t pain
Because of
Love failure.

I didn’t stop smiling
I didn’t drink alcohol
When my girlfriend
Walked away from me

Today’s love is not
Like old age love.
Today’s love has
Changed a lot.
Changed a lot.

I didn’t grow beard
I’m not depressed
I’m not Sad

Nothing has changed
Nothing has changed

Nothing has changed
around you
No wrong in being
A single.

Nothing nothing

I didn’t cry
My chest didn’t pain
Because of
Love failure.

Thank God
I am not having bad
time this Feb month

There is no one
To question me.

This love has
Changed a lot
Changed a lot

My phone’s didn’t ring
No idea to make a call
I’m not tired.

Nothing has changed
Nothing has changed

I’m didn’t feel bad
Because I lost my love
Nothing has changed
around you
No wrong in being
A single.

Whatever happens
Sound of her voice
Is enough.

While she comes
To see me,
Lightning will hit
Before my eyes

No way to live
Without thinking
Of days with her

Why such a gap?
No longer needed.

I’m crying
My heart pains
Because of
Love failure

Heart is bursting
I need alcohol
My girlfriend
walked away

Couldn’t walk
Couldn’t sleep
I am nothing
Without him

Couldn’t act
Like nothing happened
Acting is
Useless.

Nothing changed
Time will change
Will the Love ?
Nothing changed
Time will change
Love won’t!!

Nothing happened.
